attributes.action: Clean up the Mossley Estate (The former Leathern Bottle and The Eagle pub)
attributes.additional_details:
Over 20 needles found on the site near the jubilee academy school, as well as fly tipping other waste i.e beds and Bath tubs. Boards ripped of daily and people entering the site. 
After speaking to many residence they have become very intimidated around the area.

With support from our local council team..... 
"We are campaigning to CPO the derelict pubs on Cresswell Crescent, Mossley Estate. We ask that Walsall Council compulsory purchase order the Eagle Pub and former Leathern Bottle site." Bloxwich West Councillors

We need your help!!
Please sign and make our estate how it once was.
attributes.background:
We the residents of Mossley demand a clean and safe environment and the estate reformed to its former self
ENOUGH IS ENOUGH!!! Both the former Leathern Bottle site and The Eagle have became a disgrace to look at and a hot-spot for antisocial behaviour and drug using. Something has to be done.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this would be the responsibility of the local council and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. 

You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
